name: Greater Awesome Blow
source: Pathfinder #91: Battle of Bloodmarch Hills pg. 69
text: When you perform an awesome blow, you fling opponents back farther.
prerequisites: Str 25, Awesome Blow, Improved Bull Rush, Power Attack, size Large or larger.
benefit: When you make an awesome blow combat maneuver, for every 5 by which your combat maneuver check exceeds the targetâ€™s CMD, you send the target flying 5 additional feet. Furthermore, this movement provokes attacks of opportunity from your allies.
